thread.section_title: HUNTERcourse.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HUNTERcourse.com | huntercourse.com | 4 of 119
thread.title: Andrew

author: Andrew
title: Andrew
text: The course covered a broad range of topics well enough such that a true novice with no experience in the field can grasp the concepts. Some of the chapters seemed to mix some incompatible topics, such as water craft use and trapping, but I understand it is hard to give everything it's own chapter. A fix I would make would be to allow the chapter test to be taken immediately after going over that chapter material.
